snippet.title: Autonauts vs Piratebots | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
In Autonauts VS Piratebots you must gather, build and automate to defend an impenetrable base from the dreaded Piratebots.

We're now offering everyone a 10% discount during launch week, so make sure to wishlist the game to be notified as soon as the game is out.

Wishlist Autonauts vs Piratebots on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1907720/Autonauts_vs_PirateBots/

Steam owners of the original Autonauts will get an even BETTER DISCOUNT!
To reward those that have supported the original Autonauts, we’ll be offering an awesome 50% off RRP for 2 weeks after launch!

If you don’t own the original Autonauts on Steam, pick it up for 50% off during the Curve Games Midyear Madness sale!

Buy the original Autonauts on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/979120/Autonauts/


Join the Autonauts vs Piratebots community: 
🏴‍☠️Autonauts Discord: https://discord.gg/K7YRt8rQPR 
⚙️Autonauts Twitter: https://twitter.com/Automationauts 
🤖Autonauts Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Autonauts/ 

Join the Curve Games community:
🐦 Curve Games Twitter: https://twitter.com/curvegames
🎮 Curve Games Steam Group: https://store.steampowered.com/publis...
📫 Sign up for the official Curve Games newsletter here: https://curvegames.com/sign-up/
